data.eml:eml: New Afrotropical and Oriental species of Micrepimera Matile (Diptera: Keroplatidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ševčík, Jan, Papp, László (2011): New Afrotropical and Oriental species of Micrepimera Matile (Diptera: Keroplatidae). Zootaxa 3128: 58-66, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.202404
